lesson: Ordering at Different Places (Café, Fast Food, etc.)

words.definition: To ask for food or drinks.

example.en: I would like to order a coffee.

words.definition: A place that serves drinks and snacks.
A person who serves customers in a restaurant.
A list of available food and drinks.

example.en: Can I see the menu, please?
example.ar: هل يمكنني رؤية قائمة الطعام، من فضلك؟

words.definition: The total cost of a meal.

example.en: Can we have the bill, please?
example.ar: هل يمكننا الحصول على الفاتورة، من فضلك؟

words.definition: Extra money left for the waiter.

example.en: We left a tip for the waiter.

words.definition: Food that you take out of the restaurant.
A service that allows you to order from your car.
words.arabic_definition: خدمة تتيح لك الطلب من سيارتك.

example.en: We used the drive-thru to get burgers.
example.ar: استخدمنا خدمة الطلب من السيارة للحصول على البرغر.

words.definition: An arrangement to have a table saved.

example.en: We have a reservation for 7 PM.

words.definition: A featured dish at a restaurant.
words.arabic_definition: طبق متميز يتم تقديمه في المطعم.

example.ar: طبق اليوم المتميز هو مكرونة بالدجاج.
